member.name: T:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.DiscordClientExtensions
member.summary: The discord client extensions.

member.name: M:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.DiscordClientExtensions.UseLavalink(DisCatSharp.DiscordClient)

member.param: Discord client to create Lavalink instance for.

member.name: M:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.DiscordClientExtensions.UseLavalinkAsync(DisCatSharp.DiscordShardedClient)
member.summary: Creates new Lavalink clients on all shards in a given sharded client.
member.param: Discord sharded client to create Lavalink instances for.
member.returns: A dictionary of created Lavalink clients.

member.summary: Retrieves a instance for each shard.
member.param: The shard client to retrieve instances from.
member.returns: A dictionary containing instances for each shard.

member.name: T:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkBandAdjustment
member.summary: Represents Lavalink equalizer band adjustment. This is used to alter the sound output by using Lavalink's equalizer.

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkBandAdjustment.BandId
member.summary: Gets the ID of the band to adjust.

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkBandAdjustment.Gain
member.summary: Gets the gain of the specified band.

member.name: M:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkBandAdjustment.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates a new band adjustment with specified parameters.
member.param: Which band to adjust. Must be in 0-14 range.
By how much to adjust the band. Must be greater than or equal to -0.25 (muted), and less than or equal to +1.0. +0.25 means the band is doubled.

member.summary: The lavalink band adjustment comparer.

member.summary: Whether two band adjustments are equal.

member.name: T:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkRoutePlannerType
member.summary: The lavalink route planner type.

member.name: F:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkRoutePlannerType.RotatingIpRoutePlanner
member.summary: Route planner that switches the IP on ban.

member.name: F:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkRoutePlannerType.BalancingIpRoutePlanner
member.summary: Route planner that selects random IP addresses from the given block.

member.name: F:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkRoutePlannerType.NanoIpRoutePlanner
member.summary: Route planner that switches the IP on every clock update.

member.name: F:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkRoutePlannerType.RotatingNanoIpRoutePlanner
member.summary: Route planner that switches the IP on every clock update and rotates to next IP block on a ban as a fallback.

member.summary: Gets the track that finished playing.

member.summary: Gets the reason why the track stopped playing.

member.name: M:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackFinishEventArgs.#ctor(DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkGuildConnection,DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkTrack,DisCatSharp.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackEndReason)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackEndReason
member.summary: Represents a reason why a track finished playing.

member.name: F:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackEndReason.Finished
member.summary: This means that the track itself emitted a terminator. This is usually caused by the track reaching the end, however it will also be used when it ends due to an exception.

member.name: F:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackEndReason.LoadFailed
member.summary: This means that the track failed to start, throwing an exception before providing any audio.

member.name: F:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackEndReason.Stopped
member.summary: The track was stopped due to the player being stopped by either calling stop() or playTrack(null).

member.name: F:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackEndReason.Replaced
member.summary: The track stopped playing because a new track started playing. Note that with this reason, the old track will still play until either its buffer runs out or audio from the new track is available.

member.name: F:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackEndReason.Cleanup
member.summary: The track was stopped because the cleanup threshold for the audio player was reached. This triggers when the amount of time passed since the last call to AudioPlayer#provide() has reached the threshold specified in player manager configuration. This may also indicate either a leaked audio player which was discarded, but not stopped.

member.name: T:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration
member.summary: Lavalink connection configuration.

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration.RestEndpoint
member.summary:
Sets the endpoint for Lavalink REST.
Defaults to 127.0.0.1 on port 2333.

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration.SocketEndpoint
member.summary:
Sets the endpoint for the Lavalink Websocket connection.
Defaults to 127.0.0.1 on port 2333.

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration.SocketAutoReconnect
member.summary:
Sets whether the connection wrapper should attempt automatic reconnects should the connection drop.
Defaults to true.

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration.Password
member.summary:
Sets the password for the Lavalink connection.
Defaults to "youshallnotpass".

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration.ResumeKey
member.summary:
Sets the resume key for the Lavalink connection.
This will allow existing voice sessions to continue for a certain time after the client is disconnected.

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration.ResumeTimeout
member.summary:
Sets the time in seconds when all voice sessions are closed after the client disconnects.
Defaults to 60 seconds.

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration.WebSocketCloseTimeout
member.summary:
Sets the time in milliseconds to wait for Lavalink's voice WebSocket to close after leaving a voice channel.
This will be the delay before the guild connection is removed.
Defaults to 3000 milliseconds.

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration.Region
member.summary:
Sets the voice region ID for the Lavalink connection.
This should be used if nodes should be filtered by region with .

member.name: M:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of .

member.name: M:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration.#ctor(DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of , copying the properties of another configuration.
member.param: Configuration the properties of which are to be copied.

member.name: T:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkEvents
member.summary: Contains well-defined event IDs used by the Lavalink extension.

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkEvents.Misc
member.summary: Miscellaneous events, that do not fit in any other category.

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkEvents.LavalinkConnectionError
member.summary: Events pertaining to Lavalink node connection errors.

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkEvents.LavalinkConnectionClosed
member.summary: Events emitted for clean disconnects from Lavalink.

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkEvents.LavalinkConnected
member.summary: Events emitted for successful connections made to Lavalink.

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkEvents.LavalinkDecodeError
member.summary: Events pertaining to errors that occur when decoding payloads received from Lavalink nodes.

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkEvents.LavalinkRestError
member.summary: Events emitted when Lavalink's REST API responds with an error.

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkEvents.LavalinkWsRx
member.summary: Events containing raw payloads, received from Lavalink nodes.

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkEvents.LavalinkWsTx
member.summary: Events containing raw payloads, as they're being sent to Lavalink nodes.

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkEvents.Intents
member.summary: Events pertaining to Gateway Intents. Typically diagnostic information.

summary.para: Gets the information about the playlist loaded as a result of this request.
Only applicable if is set to .

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkLoadResult.Exception
member.summary: Gets the exception details if a track loading failed.

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkLoadResult.Tracks
member.summary: Gets the tracks that were loaded as a result of this request.

member.name: T:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkLoadFailedInfo
member.summary: Represents properties sent when a Lavalink track is unable to load.

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkLoadFailedInfo.Message
member.summary: Gets the message of the sent exception.

member.name: P:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkLoadFailedInfo.Severity
member.summary: Gets the severity level of the track loading failure.

member.name: T:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LoadFailedSeverity
member.summary: Represents severity level of the track loading failure.

member.name: F:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LoadFailedSeverity.Common
member.summary: Indicates a known cause for the failure, and not because of Lavaplayer.

member.name: F:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LoadFailedSeverity.Suspicious
member.summary: Indicates an unknown cause for the failure, most likely caused by outside sources.

member.name: F:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LoadFailedSeverity.Fault
member.summary: Indicates an issue with Lavaplayer or otherwise no other way to determine the cause.

member.name: T:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkUtilities
member.summary: Various utilities for Lavalink.

member.name: M:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkUtilities.MayStartNext(DisCatSharp.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackEndReason)
member.summary: Indicates whether a new track should be started after receiving this TrackEndReason. If this is false, either this event is already triggered because another track started (REPLACED) or because the player is stopped (STOPPED, CLEANUP).

member.name: M:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.LavalinkUtilities.DecodeTrack(System.String)
member.summary: Decodes a Lavalink track string.

member.name: T:DisCatSharp.Lavalink.JavaBinaryReader
member.summary: Java's DataOutputStream always uses big-endian, while BinaryReader always uses little-endian. This class converts a big-endian stream to little-endian, and includes some helper methods for interacting with Lavaplayer/Lavalink.
